channel.title: CVE Feed for mermaid-js -- mermaid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mermaid-js -- mermaid

item.title: CVE-2021-43861|2024-08-04T04:10:17.137Z -- mermaid-js -- mermaid
item.description: Mermaid is a Javascript based diagramming and charting tool that uses Markdown-inspired text definitions and a renderer to create and modify complex diagrams. Prior to version 8.13.8, malicious diagrams can run javascript code at diagram readers' machines. Users should upgrade to version 8.13.8 to receive a patch. There are no known workarounds aside from upgrading.
